layman_description: Classification indicating tool suitable for rock breaking.

player_impact: Determines which tools fell trees efficiently.

layman_description: Classification indicating tool suitable for animal processing.
technical_description: Category flag affecting meat extraction from carcasses.
player_impact: Determines how much meat you get per animal.

layman_description: Temporary mood boost from comfortable activities.
technical_description: Status effect increasing player happiness stat temporarily.
player_impact: Provides sprint speed bonus for limited duration.

layman_description: Temperature debuff from exposure to cold.
technical_description: Status effect reducing movement speed in cold biomes.
player_impact: Slows movement during snowy or alpine exploration.

layman_description: Damage over time effect from fire exposure.
technical_description: Status effect dealing periodic fire damage.
player_impact: Requires extinguishing by water or healing items.

layman_description: Health drain from open wounds.
technical_description: Status effect causing periodic health reduction.
player_impact: Requires medical treatment to stop damage.

layman_description: Disease from zombie bite requiring antibiotics.
technical_description: Status effect causing progressive health deterioration.
player_impact: Zombie bite consequence requiring medical item cure.

layman_description: Toxin effect reducing health and vision.
technical_description: Status effect impairing vision and dealing damage.

layman_description: Radiation poisoning from hazmat exposure.
technical_description: Status effect causing mutations and health loss.
player_impact: Requires protective gear or immediate evacuation.

layman_description: Incapacitation from impact or electricity.
technical_description: Status effect freezing player controls temporarily.

layman_description: Electrical damage effect from electric sources.
technical_description: Status effect applying electrical energy damage.

layman_description: Damage vulnerability making you fragile.
technical_description: Status effect doubling incoming damage temporarily.
player_impact: Requires defensive positioning until debuff expires.

layman_description: Movement impairment from venom or neurotoxin.
technical_description: Status effect completely disabling player movement.
player_impact: Complete vulnerability requiring cure or escape.

layman_description: Exhaustion reducing sprint capability.
technical_description: Status effect disabling sprint movement mode.

layman_description: Vision impairment and control distortion.
technical_description: Status effect rotating camera controls inversely.
